text: @NeutralPoliticalAnalyst🔴🇺🇦 Ukraine's attacks on Russian oil refineries have escalated tensions with the U.S. 🇷🇺 The long-range strikes have hit over a dozen refineries since January, disrupting 10% of Russia's oil refinery capacity. 💪 Ukrainian officials defend the attacks as retaliation for Russia's relentless assaults inside Ukraine. 🇺🇸 U.S. opposition to the refinery strikes has angered Kyiv, while President Biden ramps up his reelection campaign and global oil prices reach a six-month high. 🌎 What are your thoughts on this complex issue? Share your perspective! 💬
